evidence.claim: The company utilizes AWS services including Lambda and EC2 for their cloud infrastructure.
Healthcare Integrations, LLC has compliance mechanisms for HIPAA and utilizes FHIR APIs for healthcare data exchange.
They leverage Google Cloud Pub/Sub for real-time event streaming.
The company implements X12 transaction sets for electronic data interchange in healthcare processes.
Integration middleware solutions are utilized to enable interoperability between EHRs and various healthcare databases.

icp.icp_reason: Offers X12 transaction sets and HIPAA compliant solutions, indicating strong alignment with ICP criteria.
